item.title: By: Eradon
item.dc:creator: Eradon
item.description: In my mind, you should be able to enter your raid into AV. It should just be on a global relam-vs-realm channel thing. Just think about it, Nihilum against Death And Taxes, everyone equipped with T3. An entire line of Warriors charging simmultaniously, mages blinking into the enemy lines and Frost Nova'ing, Priest who would actually heal. Thats awesome for ya right there.
item.content:encoded:
In my mind, you should be able to enter your raid into AV. It should just be on a global relam-vs-realm channel thing.
Just think about it, Nihilum against Death And Taxes, everyone equipped with T3. An entire line of Warriors charging simmultaniously, mages blinking into the enemy lines and Frost Nova’ing, Priest who would actually heal. Thats awesome for ya right there.

item.title: By: Mephator
item.dc:creator: Mephator
item.description:
From what I've heard, all the mod does is utilize a command that Blizzard already has implemented into the UI.
And even if this isn't true, I don't see how it would be illegal. Like you said, it's about as effective as shouting "1... 2... 3... GO" on Vent. It's not like it's a guaranteed thing and will cause you to win every single AV ever.
item.content:encoded:
From what I’ve heard, all the mod does is utilize a command that Blizzard already has implemented into the UI.

And even if this isn’t true, I don’t see how it would be illegal. Like you said, it’s about as effective as shouting “1… 2… 3… GO” on Vent. It’s not like it’s a guaranteed thing and will cause you to win every single AV ever.
